member.name: T:Google.Apis.Latitude.v1.Data.LatitudeCurrentlocationResourceJson
member.summary: A Location resource identifies a user's position at a particular time. It may include metadata about the user's position, such as a venue if the location was recorded at the time of a check-in.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Latitude.v1.Data.LatitudeCurrentlocationResourceJson.Accuracy
member.summary: Accuracy of the latitude and longitude coordinates, in non-negative meters. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Latitude.v1.Data.LatitudeCurrentlocationResourceJson.ActivityId
member.summary: Unique ID of the Buzz message that corresponds to the check-in associated with this location. Available only for check-in locations. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Latitude.v1.Data.LatitudeCurrentlocationResourceJson.Altitude
member.summary: Altitude of the location, in meters. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Latitude.v1.Data.LatitudeCurrentlocationResourceJson.AltitudeAccuracy
member.summary: Accuracy of the altitude value, in meters. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Latitude.v1.Data.LatitudeCurrentlocationResourceJson.Heading
member.summary: Direction of travel of the user when this location was recorded. In degrees, clockwise relative to true north. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Latitude.v1.Data.LatitudeCurrentlocationResourceJson.Kind
member.summary: Kind of this item.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Latitude.v1.Data.LatitudeCurrentlocationResourceJson.Latitude
member.summary: Latitude of the location, in decimal degrees.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Latitude.v1.Data.LatitudeCurrentlocationResourceJson.Longitude
member.summary: Longitude of the location, in decimal degrees.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Latitude.v1.Data.LatitudeCurrentlocationResourceJson.Speed
member.summary: Ground speed of the user at the time this location was recorded, in meters per second. Non-negative. Optional.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Latitude.v1.Data.LatitudeCurrentlocationResourceJson.TimestampMs
member.summary: Timestamp of the Location Resource, in milliseconds since the epoch (UTC). This is also the Location Resource's unique id.
